title: Morocco in bloom
caption: Morocco in bloom
desc: Millions of roses are harvested in May and June each year in the Dades Valley of Morocco, known as the Valley of Roses. (It's also known as the Valley of a Thousand Kasbahs, after the many traditional fortresses found here.) The Asif M’Goun River flows from high in the Atlas Mountains, bringing water to the valleys below.
copyright: Ruins of a kasbah in Kalaat M'Gouna, Morocco (© Leonid Andronov/Getty Images)
